title: Gwyneth Paltrow poses topless as she reveals her 'ambitions have been unleashed'
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Gwyneth Paltrow has declared her 'ambitions have been released' as she poses topless, with just braces to protect her modesty.

The 47-year-old actress has hailed her lifestyle brand, Goop, as the catalyst for feeling like she is achieving her life goals.

Speaking to ELLE for the magazine's annual Women in Hollywood issue, Gwyneth opened up about how Goop has affected her life since launching it in 2008.

It started as a weekly newsletter but is now a company selling makeup, skincare, clothing and wellness products - it is also worth millions.

Gwyneth said: "In the ’90s, when I was coming up, it was a very male-dominated field. You used to hear, ‘That actress is so ambitious,’ like it was a dirty word.”

Goop has meant that her "ambition has been unleashed," according to Gwyneth.

She had taken a break from acting while she focused on Goop but her husband Brad Falchuk helped Gwyneth get back in front of the camera in political comedy The Politician.

Brad was apparently "like a dog with a bone," when it came to getting Gwyneth back acting and he has praised her performance in the show.

(Image: Zoey Grossman)

He said: "The reaction of most people in our lives who have seen the show is, ‘Screw you for not doing this more."

He did reveal that Gwyneth had some control over the script and some of her dialogue was cut so that she could fulfill her schedule.

Brad admitted: "She’d show me a giant chunk of her dialogue and be like, ‘I have a board meeting in two days. Please don’t make me do this.'”

(Image: Zoey Grossman)

The show launched on Netflix last month and since then, those who have watched it have tried to draw similarities between Gwyneth's character, Georgia Hobart, and her real life actions.

Close friend Kate Hudson dismissed this out of hand, telling the magazine: "Anybody who thinks that someone as successful as Gwyneth has just been floating around in caftans all day is just being rude.

"I’m way more like that than Gwyneth — I really do throw crystals around."

description: Gwyneth Paltrow has hailed the launch of her lifestyle brand Goop as the catalyst for realising her ambitions
